content.rendered:
On January 31, the district offered a virtual Family Life Parent/Guardian Information Night on our family life program and the Erin’s Law curriculum in our schools.  This presentation, offered by Saratoga Center for the Family, is designed to provide you with an overview of the age-appropriate sexual assault and abuse awareness and prevention lessons that will be taught to our elementary students in compliance with Erin’s Law.
Watch the recording of the Family Life Presentation.
